selected_script.title: Your Neighbor's Ride
selected_script.hook: Why rent from strangers when your neighbor has the perfect car?

objects.name: Car Keys
objects.visual_prompt: Shiny car keys with a colorful keychain being handed from one paw to another, warm lighting.

objects.name: Smartphone App
objects.visual_prompt: A glowing smartphone showing a car rental app interface with car icons and a map, held by animal paws.

environments.name: Suburban Driveway
environments.visual_prompt: A charming suburban house driveway with a nice car parked, green lawn, white picket fence, sunny day.

environments.name: Beach Road
environments.visual_prompt: A scenic coastal road with ocean views, palm trees, golden sunset lighting, perfect for a road trip.

environments.name: Mountain Highway
environments.visual_prompt: A winding mountain road with stunning valley views, pine trees, blue sky with fluffy clouds.

scenes.visual: A frustrated raccoon stands at a traditional car rental counter, looking exhausted. A stern-looking owl clerk points at a huge pile of paperwork. The raccoon's shoulders slump in defeat.
A disappointed bear family stands in a parking lot next to a tiny, beat-up economy car. They look at their camping gear that clearly won't fit. The smallest bear cub looks sad.
scenes.text_overlay: Never the car you actually wanted?

scenes.visual: A shocked fox stares at a rental bill, his eyes comically wide and jaw dropped. Dollar signs and exclamation marks seem to radiate from the paper he's holding.
A friendly golden retriever in a cozy sweater waves from his driveway, standing next to a beautiful red convertible. The sun is shining, birds are in the sky. He looks welcoming and trustworthy.
A happy otter taps on a glowing smartphone screen, scrolling through beautiful cars. His face is lit up with excitement. Each car thumbnail shows a friendly animal owner's profile picture.
scenes.audio: Gentle notification sounds, upbeat music continues.

scenes.visual: A smiling rabbit hands car keys to an excited deer at a suburban driveway. They shake paws warmly. A shiny SUV is parked behind them. The scene feels neighborly and friendly.
A joyful wolf family cruises down a scenic coastal highway in a convertible. Wind blows through their fur, they all look happy and free. Ocean sparkles in the background.
Multiple happy animal families in different cars driving through beautiful landscapes - mountains, beaches, forests. All waving and smiling. A warm, community feeling.
scenes.audio: Music crescendos. Voiceover: 'CarShare. Your neighbor's car, your next adventure.'
